title: Idle Welcome
prompt: Create an immersive full-screen idle state. Show cute blinking mascot eyes as the visual anchor, deep gradient background, and minimal copy. No top header action buttons. Keep optional diagnostics hidden in a left drawer trigger only.

title: Wake and Detection Transition
prompt: Design the transition from idle to monitoring when a person approaches. Eyes react (open wider), then morph into a scanning motif. Use a stylized gradient transition and subtle tech wake cue. Keep interaction clean and cinematic.

title: Local Face Recognition
prompt: Design a local recognition page for Jetson + RealSense flow. Include clear recognition status, existing-user and new-user branch controls for prototype simulation, and high-contrast readability. Keep top area clean with no action buttons.

title: New User Registration
prompt: Design a guided registration page with clear fields: name, age, medication, dosage, servo channel, and face capture preview. Keep forms large and touch-friendly. Maintain visual continuity with mascot/system style.

title: Dispensing and Greeting
prompt: Design dispensing state with motion focus. Show a clear status indicator for USB-UART dispense action and display a warm greeting banner: Hello, {name}. Preserve minimal chrome and emphasize trust/safety.

title: Advice and Voice Playback
prompt: Design advice state where generated health guidance appears with readable hierarchy and optional typewriter reveal. Include speech playback context and remaining timer. Keep controls simple and obvious on touch screen.

title: Completion Return to Idle
prompt: Design completion feedback with friendly confirmation and smooth return to immersive idle eyes state. Keep motion calm, lightweight, and reassuring.

title: Fault and Recovery
prompt: Design an error/fault state with strong visual contrast, concise explanation, and clear recovery action. Keep it consistent with the system style and suitable for kiosk operation.
